name: King Crimson
description:
吐司链接

https://tusi.art/models/605550338168129318

King Crimson: DiscoMix + Dark arts style Merge

If you've long been bored with those cute and cuddly AI animated characters

"bored, I want to see blood flowing".

Then you can try this King Crimson model, it is my carefully modulated dark and blood scarlet style anime model, where you can generate the darkest and bloodiest AI characters and the coolest Dark Knight.

King Crimson models darkness and blood as the theme of the merged models, including images of dark fantasy, gothic fantasy and horror, religious, abstract and surreal art. Whether you want to generate men, women, animals, creatures, monsters, or landscapes, you like the darker stuff.Then try this and let me know what you think!

To use it, please add ashenhard style to the beginning of parameters: to generate dark style images.

If you find it too scary, please remove the ashenhard style tag before using it, it's still a not bad (DiscoMix series) anime model that also has great results when you want to output non-dark style images, so it's not a single style model.

Recommended Parameters

Steps: 20+

hires.fix:with denoising strength 0.5-0.6,

Upscale by : 1.25, 1.5, 1.75

Size: The aspect ratio should not be too different or the body will be easily deformed

Clip skip: 1, 2

CFG scale: 7.5, 9, 11

Remember to use ashenhard style tags

If you like this model,Want to learn more and add ❤️ to receive the latest information.

Use ashenhard style tags：

Do not use ashenhard style tags
